summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx addressed to Jeffrey E. Epstein for shipping services rendered. It details transportation charges, discounts, and shipment summaries, indicating multiple shipments made by Epstein during early August 2004.

persons.name: Jeffrey E. Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey E. Epstein is the individual to whom the invoice is addressed, indicating he is the account holder for the FedEx services.

events.title: FedEx Shipment Delivery

locations: 457 Madison Ave FL 4, New York, NY 10022
keyFacts: The invoice is dated August 9, 2004, and is for a total of $329.26.
Jeffrey E. Epstein is listed as the account holder for the FedEx services.
The invoice details multiple shipments made by Epstein, with specific dates of pickup and delivery.
There are discounts applied to the total charges, amounting to $59.52 saved during this billing period.
The document includes a breakdown of transportation charges, special handling charges, and fuel surcharges.
